abstract.t: The document 'LDAPv3: Grouping of Related Operations' [GROUPING]specifies a set of LDAPv3 operations and an LDAPv3 control that canbe used to identify and manage sets of LDAP operations that aremembers of related groups. Collectively, these 'grouping' constructsprovide a general framework for defining specific LDAPv3 groupingtypes with their associated processing semantics.
